title: Bay Island
description: Possibly the best zombie fiction novel in some time!"Excruciatingly twisted; True and savage. Anyone who reads it will love it."-Shawn Cormierauthor of The Nomadin TrilogyAn isolated islandA world under siegethe dead risingAll that stands between the horror and the 334 souls that live on Bay Island is one man, a navy seal, Paul Ryan.They are about to fight for their livesBay Island takes you on a horror filled ride that never lets up for one minute. The characters are unique and enduring, and the creatures, dangerous and horrifying.Grab a seat, and get ready for the horror thriller of the year!
author: Matthew Kray
